mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, board_QnA_comment.regdate, profile FROM board_QnA_comment INNER JOIN users ON board_QnA_comment.writer=users.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_QnA_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
